report.summary: There is no 'Expand' button in the 'About Knight' window when calling about dialog
report.description: It is not possible to expand the 'About Knight' window to full screen when calling about dialog to the 'About' submenu in the 'Help' menu 1.Launch the application file Knight.exe 2. Click on the 'Help' menu button 3. Click on the 'About' submenu button There is no 'Expand' button in the 'About Dialog' window the 'Expand' button is implemented in the 'About Dialog' window minor low file.png
